amendment.description: To include a delineation of the homeland defense and civil support missions of the National Guard and Reserves in the Quadrennial Defense Review.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4377 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4377 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S6336; text: CR S6336) To include a delineation of the homeland defense and civil support missions of the National Guard and Reserves in the Quadrennial Defense Review.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4377 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4377 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
